title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
4 points are earned: For each of the forces above with arrow correctly drawn and labeled, 1 point was awarded 4 points

Notes:

The force vector T could be shown in component form or as one force, but not both. For extraneous forces, 1 point was deducted.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For the correct work equation
W = (T cosθ) d

1 point is earned: For substituting the correct displacement
W = (55N) cos20° (7.0m)
W = 360J

title: Part E

Note: The second point was awarded only if the change at was abrupt.
